front.title: YANG Data Model for SR and SR TE Topologies on IPv6 Data Plane

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for Segment Routing (SR) topology and Segment Routing (SR) Traffic Engineering (TE) topology, using IPv6 data plane. It provides the methods for representing and manipulating SR Topologies on IPv6 Data Plane, and can be used on a controller for the network-wide operations such as path computation.
